fileDescription1: Sentinel Asset Controller Configuration (SAC Config), this file controls settings related to sentinel's asset system
fileDescription2: This file MUST always be signed, the signature file is called 'archivesettings.json.sig' and key is called 'publickey.pem'
fileDescription3: Use sentinel's toolset to generate the key file and signature, DO NOT DISTRIBUTE THE PRIVATEKEY.PEM FILE.
fileDescription4: the SAC protocol is relative to the SAC root (the folder the SAC Config file is in)
fileDescription5: The verification key path is used to verify archive descriptor packages
fileDescription6: The following option controls if unsigned archive descriptors are allowed, not recommended to enable
fileDescription7: The following option defines the path to the asset archive list
fileDescription8: The following option defines the root path of the archive descriptor folder
